sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
has a bearing on a situation or event
, je povezano s tisto situacijo ali dogodkom.

seg.quote: That is all in the past. It has no bearing on what is happening today.

sense.def:
One's bearing
je način, kako se človek premika ali stoji;

To get
ali
to find one's bearings
pomeni ugotoviti, kje smo ali kaj bi morali najprej storiti.
To lose one's bearings
pomeni, da ne vemo, kje smo ali kaj moramo storiti.

seg.quote: They stopped to get their bearings.
